rawMarkdown:
--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/documentContentKind crawled: 2025-12-05T05:52:13Z --- # documentContentKind **Instance Property** Sets the kind of output content for the receiver. ## Declaration ```swift var documentContentKind: XMLDocument.ContentKind { get set } ``` ## Parameters - **kind**: An `enum` constant identifying a kind of document content. The valid NSXMLDocumentContentKind constants are `NSXMLDocumentXMLKind`, `NSXMLDocumentXHTMLKind`, `NSXMLDocumentHTMLKind`, and `NSXMLDocumentTextKind`. ## Discussion Most of the differences among document-content kind have to do with the handling of content-less tags such as `
`. ## Managing Document Attributes - **characterEncoding**: Sets the character encoding of the receiver to `encoding`, - **dtd**: Returns an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDTD] object representing the internal DTD associated with the receiver. - **isStandalone**: Sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the receiver represents a standalone XML document. - **mimeType**: Returns the MIME type for the receiver. - **version**: Sets the version of the receiver’s XML.
